title: BedDetails
description: An entity holding detailed information about the available bed types, e.g. the quantity of twin beds for a hotel room. For the single case of just one bed of a certain type, you can use bed directly with a text. See also BedType (under development).

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

typeOfBed.description: The type of bed to which the BedDetail refers, i.e. the type of bed available in the quantity indicated by quantity.

numberOfBeds.description: The quantity of the given bed type available in the HotelRoom, Suite, House, or Apartment.
